Articles.Content:
Hello people who are from space and like dem rockets.

I\'m sort of new here, so some introductions would be appreciated.

I used to use Orbiter Space Flight Simulator, but the best i could manage was LEO.

Hopefully, i get better...

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to have you here!

I used to play Orbiter too. I loved it. Then I found Kerbal and haven\'t stopped. It\'s so humorous and funny I can\'t put it down.

You will get better! I did.

Your friendly neighborhood bag of bones,

-Drakomis

P.S. I\'m one of the Forum Mods. If you need help, you can contact me and I\'ll be glad to assist!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Welcome to the KSP forums!

Enjoy your stay!

-Mincespy

P.S. I suck at orbiter too.

If you need to learn stuff go to the Help Subforum

For bug reports and ideas go to KSP Development Subform

For Ponies go to Off-Topic Subform

For discussion about the game go to General Discussion Subform

Small world, looks like a lot of the Kerbonauts are also Orbinauts :cheers:

Welcome to the forums! And disregard what Arcane said about the off-topic forums.

We\'re heavily outnumbered by the other types of weirdness/insanity over there, hehe.

:hailprobe:
Welcome to the forums.!I can\'t even get into orbit on Orbiter!

Welcome to the forums.!I can\'t even get into orbit on Orbiter!

It\'s just about the same as getting a orbit in KSP.

It\'s sooper easy.

It\'s just about the same as getting a orbit in KSP.

It\'s sooper easy.

Really? I could probably do it if i actually took time to learn the controls. ;P

Homer: Everybody in the USA,

Hates their stupid neighbor,

He\'s Flanders and he\'s really, really lame...

Flanders tried to wreck my song,

His views on birth control are wrong,

I hate his guts and Flanders is his name.

Lenny/Carl/Homer: F-L-A-N-R-D-S,

Homer: He\'s the man that I hate best,

I\'d like to see his house go up in flames.

Lenny/Carl: F-L-A,

Homer: His name is Ned!

Lenny/Carl: E-R-S,

Homer: That\'s a stupid name!

He\'s worse than Frankenstein or Dr. No.

Byrne: You can\'t upset him even slightly,

He just smiles and nods politely,

Then goes home and worships nightly,

His Leftorium, is an emporium, of woe!

Lenny/Carl: F-L-A,

Homer: Don\'t yell at Ned!

Lenny/Carl: D-E-R,

Homer: His wife is dead!

Everybody hates that stupid jerk!

Byrne: Springfield rocks with Homer\'s joyous loathing,

Filling clubs with angry Valentinos,

You don\'t have to move your feet,

Just hate Flanders to the disco beat.

Homer/Byrne: He\'s your perky, peppy, nightmare neighborino!

If you despise polite left-handers,

Homer/Byrne/Flanders: Then I doubt you\'ll like Ned Flanders

Or his creepy little offspring, Rod and Todd.

Todd: That\'s us!

Rod: Hooray!

Audience: F-L-A,

Apu: His name is Ned,

Audience: E-R-S,

Apu: He is so white bread,

Choir: A smiling moustache geek who walks with God!

Welcome! You do realize I\'m not being serious, right?

Welcome to the forums.!I can\'t even get into orbit on Orbiter!

yo dog i herd you like orbits so we put an orbit in your orbit so you can orbit while you orbit.

um.... yes, i do realize.

yo dog i herd you like orbits so we put an orbit in your orbit so you can orbit while you orbit.

The Moon orbits Earth and that orbits the Sun which orbits the center of the Milkyway which orbits the center of the universe.....
